Bash(git -C "C:\\Users\\catia\\programas\\PuroBeach\\PuroBeach" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
refactor\(reservation-panel\): create furniture mixin

Extract furniture display and reassignment functionality from
reservation-panel.js into a dedicated mixin:

- renderFurnitureSection: Display furniture chips with icons
- enterReassignmentMode: Set up UI for furniture selection
- exitReassignmentMode: Restore view mode and cleanup
- toggleFurnitureSelection: Handle furniture selection from map
- isInReassignmentMode: Query current mode
- updateReassignmentUI: Update counter, chips, capacity status
- renderOriginalFurnitureChips: Show original furniture reference
- saveReassignment: API call to update furniture assignments
- highlightReservationFurniture: Add editing class to map elements
- unhighlightReservationFurniture: Remove editing highlights

Task 8 of ReservationPanel split refactor.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
